page.title: 19THE AUTHORS - BALQUHIDDER
page.content: This project was carried out by the children and teacher of Balquhidder School with the support of the Local Studies Adviser of Central Regional Council's Education Department and the encouragement of the parents. Special thanks is due to the residents in the Glen who came in to school to answer the children's questions and who allowed the school access to their properties. The children's love of their homeland speaks for itself in the song which they wrote and set to music entitled "In Praise of Balquhidder". Lastly thanks is due to our local authoress, Elizabeth Beauchamp, whose book "The Braes of Balquhidder" was used as a reference.
